Sentencas: This study reports the synthesis of proton-conducting Ba1-xKxCe0.6Zr0.2Y0.2O3-delta (x=0.025-0.075) ceramics by using a combination of citrate-EDTA complexing sol-gel process and the composition-exchange method.
Titulo: Proton-conducting Ba1-xKxCe0.6Zr0.2Y0.2O3-δ oxides synthesized by sol-gel combined with composition-exchange method

Sentencas: Compared to the sintered oxides of similar composition prepared from conventional sol gel powders, Ba1-xKxCe0.6Zr0.2Y0.2O3-delta oxides synthesized by sol gel combined with the composition-exchange method are found to exhibit improved sinterability, higher conductivity, more homogeneous phase, and excellent chemical stability against CO2.
Titulo: Proton-conducting Ba1-xKxCe0.6Zr0.2Y0.2O3-δ oxides synthesized by sol-gel combined with composition-exchange method

Sentencas: Among all sintered oxides in this study, the Ba0.925K0.075Ce0.6Zr0.2Y0.2O3-delta Pellet fabricated by this new method has the highest conductivity, 0.0094 S/cm at 800 degrees C, which is higher than those pressed from conventional sol gel powders in the K doping range of 0-15%.
Titulo: Proton-conducting Ba1-xKxCe0.6Zr0.2Y0.2O3-δ oxides synthesized by sol-gel combined with composition-exchange method

Sentencas: Based on the experimental results, we discuss the mechanism for improvement in these properties in terms of calcined particle characteristics.
Titulo: Proton-conducting Ba1-xKxCe0.6Zr0.2Y0.2O3-δ oxides synthesized by sol-gel combined with composition-exchange method

Sentencas: This work demonstrates that Ba1-xKxCe0.6Zr0.2Y0.2O3-delta oxides synthesized by sol-gel combined with the composition-exchange method would be a promising electrolyte for H+-SOFC applications.
Titulo: Proton-conducting Ba1-xKxCe0.6Zr0.2Y0.2O3-δ oxides synthesized by sol-gel combined with composition-exchange method

Sentencas: More importantly, this new fabrication approach may be applied to other similar material systems, such as Sr-doped Ba(Ce,Zr)O-3 ceramics.
Titulo: Proton-conducting Ba1-xKxCe0.6Zr0.2Y0.2O3-δ oxides synthesized by sol-gel combined with composition-exchange method
Proton-conducting Ba1-xKxCe0.6Zr0.2Y0.2O3-δ oxides synthesized by sol-gel combined with composition-exchange method
